testcase.name: hasitemAssertion

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. JSON path data[0] doesn't match. Expected: (a collection containing "cerulean") Actual: <{id=1, name=cerulean, year=2000, color=#98B2D1, pantone_value=15-4020}>
